main event: A civilian observed a light in the sky that appeared to move like a satellite on June 11, 1966, in Lynchburg, Virginia.
interesting points: The observation lasted for 6 minutes,The object was noted to have a north-south motion characteristic of a satellite,The observer described the object as bright white and brighter than the North Star,There were no other witnesses reported in the area,The conclusion of the report suggested it was a satellite (Echo II).
